summary: Tired of stopping to pick at every dead Draugr or Bandit, when you\'d rather be bashing heads?  Then check this out probably.  Any fallen enemy in front of you is automatically stripped of all gold, jewelry, gems, metals, arrows, restoration potions, and ingredients.
descriptionHtml:
Don\'t waste time with fallen Draugr or Bandits anymore -- now you can just stand in front of their body, and all their gold, jewelry, gems, metals, arrows, restoration potions, and ingredients will be automagically transferred to you.

You will be notified of any gold you acquire, and if other kinds of items are taken it will display \"Item(s) looted\" in the corner.

This works for all fallen corpses of any kind, except certain mummified pre-placed Draugr (these are containers instead of actors, I think).

Note: the only jewelry looted by this mod is the generic kind.  Enchanted or unique jewelry is not.  Items that are added by mods are not auto-looted.

To change what to loot or leave behind, edit the .ini file.

[u]-Requirements-[/u]
Requires Script Dragon, found here: http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon

[u]-Installation-[/u]
1. Install Script Dragon from the above link.
2. Place autoLooter.asi into the skyrim/asi folder.  [i]If you don\'t have one, make one.[/i]

[u]-Uninstalling-[/u]
Delete autoLooter.asi.

[u]-Changelog-[/u]
1.1.1 - now loots restore potions as well.
1.1 - Now fully configurable, allows disabling/enabling categories of loot.  Added weight limit option.  Added option to loot everything.

[u]-Credit-[/u]
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon.
author: Eldiran
